Package de.undercouch.citeproc.mendeley

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MendeleyConnector
    Reads documents from the Mendeley REST services.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticatedMendeleyConnector
    A Mendeley connector that saves its access token in an authentication store, so you don't have to authenticate again until the access token becomes invalid.
    DefaultMendeleyConnector
    Default implementation of a MendeleyConnector
    MendeleyConnectorAdapter
    Can be used by MendeleyConnector implementations to delegate to an underlying connector
    MendeleyConverter
    Converts Mendeley documents to CSL citation items.
